Package Collecto

Class TUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • Collecto.TUI
  • public class TUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the Textual User Interface used by all other classes in the Collecto program to print anything on the screen of a user. It contains methods to return logs with dates and time added to them, print strings, print errors, print a board, print a help menu and return a string with coloured balls. It is used by many classes, mainly the Game, Client, Server and PlayerHandler classes.
    See Also:
    Game, Client, Server, PlayerHandler

      • colouredBoard

        public static java.lang.String colouredBoard​(GridBoard gridBoard)
        Returns coloured representation of the GridBoard provided. Returned representation has line numeration starting from 1 and ANSI coloured balls names.
        Parameters:
        gridBoard - GridBoard to represent as a string
        Returns:
        coloured string representation of the given GridBoard

      • printHelpClient

        public static void printHelpClient()
        Prints help for client. Help contains all commands client can directly use and their descriptions.

      • ballColours

        public static java.lang.String ballColours​(java.util.ArrayList<Ball> balls)
        Converts provided array of balls to string, where every ball in array is being represented as a special symbol (●) with set colour of this ball. Being used to show balls of player.
        Parameters:
        balls - array of balls to be represented as string
        Returns:
        string with balls in provided array represented as coloured symbols
